Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: 3rd Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Universita’ Politecnica delle Marche (January 2009).
4th Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Universita’ di Pisa (January 2011).
European Meeting of the Econometric Society, Malaga (August 2012).
5th Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Universita’ di Genova (January 2013).
Cambridge-INET Conference “Skewness, Heavy Tails, Market Crashes, and Dynamics”, Cambridge (April 2014).
1st Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics (IAAE), London (June 2014).
8th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, Pisa (Invited Speaker, December 2014)
6th Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Universita’ di Salerno (January 2015).
2nd Vienna Workshop for High Dimensional Time Series in Macroeconomics and Finance (May 2015).
2nd Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics (IAAE), Thessaloniki (June 2015)
9th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, London (Invited Speaker, December 2015)
3rd Annual Conference of the International Association for Applied Econometrics (IAAE), Milan (June 2016).
